description: This file defines the TransactionEntity class which represents a transaction record in the banking system, including fields for id, amount, transaction type, reference number, transaction id, and associated bank account.

classes.description: Entity class representing a banking transaction, mapped to the 'banking_core_transaction' table with fields for transaction details and linked account.
